text: "Makhna" is a hit single by the Indian rapper Yo Yo Honey Singh and Neha Kakkar. The track was released on 21 December 2018 as a single by T-Series via YouTube. The video features Nidhi Sunil and Yo Yo Honey Singh. It's one the most expensive single music video in India and is shot in Old Havana, Cuba. == Music video == The musical video marks the comeback song of the rapper after the extended break of 4 years due to his Bipolar disorder. The musical video is produced by Bhushan Kumar of T-Series and co-produced by Bobby Suri and Yo Yo Honey Singh and is directed by Daniel Duran. == Reception == The song has received commercial success, peaking at the number one position on YouTube India views, crossing 20 million views in 24 hours of its release, It is currently the most commented Indian music video song on YouTube. As of 16 August 2020, it has over 271 million views on YouTube with over 3.4 milion likes. == References == == External links == * * Makhna on Hungama.com * Makhna on iTunes Category:2018 songs Category:2018 singles Category:Hindi songs Category:Indian songs Category:Yo Yo Honey Singh songs Category:Neha Kakkar songs Category:T-Series singles
title: Makhna
